mapper.sql: id, name, contacts, phone, remarks, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, sort, province_id, province_name, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, address, is_enable, branch_company_id
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.name, a.contacts, a.phone, a.remarks, a.create_time "createTime" , a.update_time "updateTime", a.create_by "createBy", a.update_by "updateBy" , a.sort, a.province_id "provinceId", c.name "provinceName", a.city_id "cityId" , d.name "cityName", a.area_id "areaId", e.name "areaName", a.address, a.is_enable "isEnable" , a.branch_company_id "branchCompanyId" , b.name "branchCompanyName" from lease_maintenance_partner a LEFT JOIN lease_branch_company b ON a.branch_company_id = b.id LEFT JOIN lease_area c ON a.province_id = c.id LEFT JOIN lease_area d ON a.city_id = d.id LEFT JOIN lease_area e ON a.area_id = e.id WHERE 1=1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

select
from lease_maintenance_partner ORDER BY create_time DESC
